text:
@ABC They are both black and white,
But do you see them fight?
They are friends and family,
All wishing to be healthy.
No prejudice or fear,
Just wondering what's here.
It's not a form of insanity,
Mother Nature includes humanity.

#Humanity #Coronavirus #SouthAfrica @MrJonCryer
